English: Flag of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Cymraeg: Baner De Georgia ac Ynysoedd Sandwich y De
Kernowek: Baner Jeorji Dheghow hag Ynysow Sandwich Deghow
Русский: Флаг Южной Георгии и Южных Сандвичевых островов

It is from openclipart.org, specifically south_georgia_and_south_sandwich_islands.svg by Tobias Jakobs.


 This file is from the Open Clip Art Library, which released it explicitly into the public domain (see here).

To the uploader: Please provide as parameter the link to the page where this image appears.
